questions.quote: Haven't been in the lab yet. But I am birth control shopping today.
Jerry, can't you incorporate one unselfish act in your daily routine?
Not with that big glass window looking out into the hall. I'd love a good nap. That's the only thing getting me out of bed in the morning. I'll see ya'.
How can you say that I still like you, when I didn't even say hi to you?
Well, I don't keep pecans in the house so I didn't think it'd be a problem.
George and I just signed up with the Senior Citizen's Volunteer Agency. Same thing Elaine's doing.
Oh, well, I didn't do much. I just sat in the sauna. You know, it was more like a Jewish workout. I'll see ya.
Must be one of those rich, spoiled handicapped people, who didn't want to do any work, and just wanted to sit in her wheelchair and take it easy.
The appeal of the posse? The posse has tremendous appeal. Get away from the job, camp out, you're with your friends... Come on, it's a week-long game of hide-and-seek on horseback.
Oh, I bought a bunch of bunion stories from Newman - but they all stink!
